page.description: The name of an Xbasic function to call after a server side error has occurred before the error message is displayed to the user.

section.description: The Xbasic function specified is called after a server side error has occurred. The Xbasic function can modify the value of the *[xb:e.errorMesage]* variable, which contains the error message generated by the server.

property.name: errorMessage
property.description: The server-side error message. Your function can modify the value of the e.errorMesage variable.
